channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Upstart Crow
channel.desc: There's money to be made investing in cargos from the New World, but while Marlowe invests in tobacco and potato products, Will would rather invest in building a new theatre. But when Will's savings go missing he's forced to make a rather unusual bargain with his rival Robert Greene. Meanwhile, Kate's frustration with the lack of roles for women leads her to make a rather dramatic intervention.
